mapper.select: SELECT `name` AS name, `status` AS STATUS, openedBy AS openedBy, openedDate AS openedDate, realStarted AS realStarted, finishedBy AS finishedBy, finishedDate AS finishedDate, canceledBy AS canceledBy, canceledDate AS canceledDate, closedBy AS closedBy, closedDate AS closedDate FROM zt_task WHERE zt_task.openedDate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}
SELECT realname FROM zt_user WHERE account = #{englishName}
